arealutils 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    besag_aghq()
    Fit Besag Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    besag_inla()
    Fit Besag Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    besag_tmb()
    Fit Besag Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    besag_tmbstan()
    Fit Besag Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    best_average()
    Compute length-scale such that averagely distant points have correlation p.
    border_lengths()
    Create object containing lengths of borders from sf object.
    border_precision()
    Create border ICAR precision matrix from sf.
    bym2_aghq()
    Fit BYM2 Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    bym2_inla()
    Fit BYM2 Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    bym2_tmb()
    Fit BYM2 Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    bym2_tmbstan()
    Fit BYM2 Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    centroid_covariance()
    Compute centroid kernel Gram matrix.
    centroid_distance()
    Compute distances between area centroids.
    ck_aghq()
    Fit Bayesian Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    ck_tmb()
    Fit Bayesian Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    ck_tmbstan()
    Fit Bayesian Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    constant_aghq()
    Fit constant Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    constant_inla()
    Fit constant Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    constant_tmb()
    Fit constant Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    constant_tmbstan()
    Fit constant Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    create_folds()
    Create cross-validation training data sets.
    create_sf_grid()
    Create height by width grid sf object
    crps()
    Compute an approximation to the continuous ranked probability score.
    dic()
    Deviance information criterion generic.
    dxbinom()
    Density of the generalised binomial distribution.
    fck_aghq()
    Fit Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    fck_inla()
    Fit Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    fck_tmb()
    Fit Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    fck_tmbstan()
    Fit Centroid MVN Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    fik_aghq()
    Fit Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    fik_inla()
    Fit Sampling MVN Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    fik_tmb()
    Fit Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    fik_tmbstan()
    Fit Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    get_scale()
    Compute scale of a precision matrix using R-INLA.
    get_time()
    Report the time taken to fit the model.
    held_out_metrics()
    Compute forecast assessments for model at a single held-out point.
    iid_aghq()
    Fit IID Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    iid_inla()
    Fit IID Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.
    iid_tmb()
    Fit IID Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    iid_tmbstan()
    Fit IID Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    ik_aghq()
    Fit Bayesian Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using aghq.
    ik_tmb()
    Fit Bayesian Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using TMB.
    ik_tmbstan()
    Fit Bayesian Integrated MVN Small Area Estimation model using tmbstan.
    integrated_covariance()
    Compute integrated kernel Gram matrix.
    invgamma_prior()
    Find parameters of the inverse Gamma distribution such that plb of the probability mass is below lb and pub of the probability mass is above ub.
    list_to_df()
    Bind the rows of a list together, adding an id column.
    marginal_intervals()
    Intervals for posterior marginals.
    mat_to_nb()
    Wrapper function for spdep::mat2listw.
    matern()
    The Matern covariance function with smoothness parameter 3/2.
    mw
    Malawi DHS 2015 Survey Data.
    nb_to_graph()
    Create a graph from nb.
    nb_to_precision()
    Create ICAR precision matrix from nb.
    plot_graph()
    Produce a ggplot2 visualisation of a (neighbourhood) graph.
    plot_matrix()
    Produce a ggplot2 visualisation of a matrix.
    riebler_gv()
    Compute the Riebler generalised variance of a covariance matrix.
    rows_to_list()
    Convert the rows of a dataframe to a list.
    sample_marginal()
    Marginal samples.
    scale_gmrf_precision()
    Scales the precision matrix of a Gaussian Markov random field.
    sf_to_nb()
    Wrapper function for spdep::poly2nb.
    update_naming()
    A dictionary to convert from internal names to human readable names, used in the manuscript.
    waic()
    Watanabe–Akaike (Widely-Applicable) information criterion generic.
    wicar_inla()
    Fit Weighted ICAR Small Area Estimation model using R-INLA.

    Developed by Adam Howes.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
